title: Vayne Dragonslayer Chroma Pack

embed.description: Gyazo lets you instantly grab the screen and upload the image/GIF to the web. You can easily share them on Chat, Twitter, Blog, Tumblr, etc. Available for Windows, Mac and Linux.

body:
The Vayne Dragonslayer Chroma pack isn't even showing me the options for the color selections.

Edit: Bug fix found; relog solved issue

replies.body:
Hiya! 

Glad to see this has been resolved. 

We're currently working to resolve issues where chroma packs aren't able to be selected and are not showing up in Team Builder queues.
